* Bar Le St-Sulpice <nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&hl=en&geocode=&time=&date=&ttype=&q=1680+Rue+St-Denis,+Montr%C3%A9al,+QC,+Canada&sll=37.0625,-95.677068&sspn=40.409448,82.265625&ie=UTF8&z=16&iwloc=addr&om=1|1680, Saint-Denis, Montréal, Québec, H2X3K6]]</nowiki>
